caption.p: 3D Structural Model of rat ASIC3. (a) front view of rASIC3 subunit domains. (b) Side view of homotrimeric rASIC3. (c) Top view from extracellular side. Individual subunits are shown in different colors for A and B. The homology model of rASIC3 was built using the published crystal structure of chicken ASIC1a as template (PDB: 2QTS, PMID: 17,882,215); for details of rASIC3 modeling see Rahman and Smith 2014
